feature_name: Run quality tests provided by the editor

user_story.i_want: install the module and run the following tests
user_story.so_that: run the quality tests provided by base_module_quality

givens_list: I want to run the quality tests provided by base_module_quality on installed module
whens_list: run the quality check on every installed module
thens_list: I should have a report on every module
all module, except base, should have a final score greater than 70.0 percent
above is a detailed summary of the results
